name: Uppergrowth
description:
IF YOU HAVE THE BUG WHERE THE PLAYER GETS STUCK IN THE PLANT IT HAS TO DO WITH LOW FPS YOU CAN DO EITHER OF THESE THINGS

Turn off Fullscreen

Turn on Hardware Acceleration in your browser settings

Download the windows build: https://waterlemon0.itch.io/aa (it has zero changes from the game jam version)

If none of those work thanks for visiting the page have a good jam



Play as a seed and grow the tallest plant you can! Collect water droplets to moisten yourself to plant yourself into the ground or the plant itself.

Keep climbing up until you reach the end!

Controls:
W - Jump
A and D - Move Left and Right
Space - Plant yourself into the ground or the plant 

R - Retry (Do this if you get stuck!!)

Credits:

The music and a couple of sound effects were done by whocares08!

Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2020

Theme of the jam: Out Of Control
